ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define various criteria to determine a product for medium weight payment. Based on the payment characteristics, a product will be determined and this product is linked to various others, like: Fee, Ledger, Client Condition, Posting and Routing product. This is also linked to various transaction codes to be used while booking the payments. They will influence the flow of payment based on the output parameters.
ovdesc.P: The details will be stored in the store table, PPL.MEDIUMWEIGHTPRODUCTCOND.
